Additionally, the AI presented a checklist of potential features to enhance the pirate theme, such as adding pirate-themed icons and animations, to which the user provided feedback on specific preferences regarding vocabulary and tone.

Next, the user shifted requests towards a dinosaur theme, prompting the AI to confirm changes while discussing features like dinosaur-themed animations and text. The AI included questions related to the preferred style and humor level of the text, receiving direction from the user.

Subsequently, the user requested to add a "Contact Santa" form, and the AI confirmed it would implement this alongside soliciting user preferences for form fields and design. As conversations progressed, the themes continued to shift between pirates and dinosaurs, with the user frequently asking for changes to images and text, while the AI consistently acknowledged user input and confirmed implementation of the requested features.

Through various prompts, the AI also offered feature implementations, such as adding a button labeled "Shoryouken," which the user repeatedly asked to be added while providing information on its placement and intended functionality. Throughout the interaction, the user aimed to add playful and thematic elements to the app while the AI ensured to follow up appropriately on every request.
